General.Name: Moorim P&P Co Ltd
General.Description: Moorim P&P Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of paper and pulp products in South Korea and internationally. The company produces and sells bleached chemical pulp and magnesium hydroxide. It also manufactures and sells printing papers, including art and white papers; and engages in the provision of credit and forestry businesses. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Ulsan, South Korea.
General.Address: 3-36 Woobong Gangyang Road, Ulsan, South Korea
